name: Science Match Animals
description:
Science Match: Animals is the next in a series of "Edutainment" applications designed to teach Science while also providing a fun memory matching game. Science Match: Animals takes users into the wilds, allowing them to discover the wonders of our vast Animal Kingdom. Users can access the Database to find fun and easy to understand data cards which provide keen information for inquisitive young minds.

What's included:

- 3 classifications of Memory Cards
- 3 Memory Game Modes
- Over 20 different Animals from across the globe
- Science Database containing descriptions of each Animal
- Kid-friendly text, making learning about Animals interesting and FUN!
- High Quality imagery from across the globe
- Scorekeeping to indicate the number of taps per round
- Time Keeper to indicate how long each game round takes


This Game Application is a window to nature's wilds and beyond!
